Header: Suicide Jumper Kills Man Walking With Family
Content: A South Korean student who committed suicide by jumping from his 20th floor apartment hit and killed another man walking home with his pregnant wife and son, a news report said Wednesday. The 38-year-old local government employee was returning from work in the southern city of Gwangju on Tuesday when he was struck by the 25-year-old student, the Yonhap news agency said. The man had been walking with his wife who was eight months pregnant and their five-year-old son. Both men were taken to a nearby hospital but neither survived, Yonhap said.
